title: NASA cancels GeoCarb greenhouse gas monitoring mission
summary: NASA has canceled a greenhouse gas monitoring mission once intended to fly as a commercial hosted payload after the mission lost its ride to orbit and suffered severe cost overruns.

title: Shay Har-Noy takes the helm at Edgybees
summary: Shay Har-Noy, former Spire Global general manager for aviation and a former DigitalGlobe and Maxar Technologies vice president, has taken the helm at Edgybees, a company that specializes in aligning satellite and aerial still and full-motion imagery.

title: SpaceX to launch Falcon 9 with private Japanese moon lander
summary: SpaceX is ready to use its reliable Falcon 9 rocket to send a privately funded mission to the surface of the moon.

title: SpaceX fires up 11 engines as it prepares massive rocket for orbital test
summary: Nothing blew up, which is always a win.

title: SiriusXM orders pair of satellites to expand in Canada and Alaska
summary: SiriusXM said Nov. 29 it has ordered two more satellites from Maxar Technologies to expand its radio broadcasting constellation.
